section.title: Introduction
section.p: The basic goal of the outsourcing is to create the following tools given the linguistic resources developed by the Divvun project team, and in cooperation with the team.

tr.td: Microsoft Office 2000 and newer (running on Windows 2000 and newer)
Microsoft Office 2004 and newer (running on MacOS X 10.3 and newer)

section.title: Adobe InDesign
section.p: The Divvun project will outsource the integration of a sme hyphenator, and possibly the whole making of the hyphenator. In the latter case, the Divvun project will provide the language-specific algorithm, and of course be responsible for testing the linguistic correctness of the deliverable.
section.note: We need to contact the most important users, and check which version they are using or will be using. There's no use in requiring the contractor to test against an older version than needed, it will only add costs to the project.

section.title: Microsoft Office
section.p: The Divvun project will outsource the making and the integration of the proofing tools for MS Office, based on the computational linguistic models developed by the project.
